price: 10. Bakeseni te epai naye oyo azali kobomba maloba naye, mpe oyo mosusu azali kobimisa ya ye polele, oyo azali komibomba na butu, mpe oyo azali komibimisa na moyi.
arabic: سَوَآءٞ مِّنكُم مَّنۡ أَسَرَّ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ وَمَن جَهَرَ بِهِۦ وَمَنۡ هُوَ مُسۡتَخۡفِۭ بِٱلَّيۡلِ وَسَارِبُۢ بِٱلنَّهَارِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: sawāon minkum man asarra al-qawla waman jahara bihi waman huwa mus'takhfin bi-al-layli wasāribun bil-nahāri
